detail_desc: Fitted T-shirt in ribbed viscose jersey with a small stand-up collar.
Scarf in an airy weave with fringes along the sides.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Short, pleated skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip and press-stud at one side. Unlined.
Fitted jacket in washed, stretch denim with buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, and side pockets.
Top in soft jersey crêpe with a slightly wider neckline and short sleeves with pleats and ribbing at the cuffs.
Dress in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with press-studs at the back of the neck and long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Detachable belt in braided imitation suede with D-rings.
Briefs in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Glittery Alice band with a tulle-decorated crown that has pearly plastic beads on top.
Short dress in patterned mesh with long sleeves, a V-neck and wrapover front with narrow ties at one side. Partly lined.

Top in a textured weave made from a viscose blend with a square neckline, short puff sleeves with narrow cuffs and adjustable buttoning, and a seam at the hem with a gently flared peplum. Partly lined.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave with a regular, elasticated waist, side pockets and slightly wider, tapered legs.

Set with a short-sleeved top, skirt with straps, pair of leggings and a hairband in cotton. Top in jersey with short butterfly sleeves and a concealed press-stud on one shoulder. Skirt in patterned, lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist and straps that cross at the back with adjustable fasteners. Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist and decorative buttons and a lace trim at the hem. Double-layered hairband in jersey with a knot detail at the front.
Flat imitation suede sandals with narrow straps and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation suede insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Padded jacket with a stand-up collar and detachable hood with a faux fur trim. Zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey, one with buttons at the top.
Hats in soft organic cotton jersey with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem.
Fitted jumper in fine-knit merino wool with a small stand-up collar, long sleeves and overlocked edges around the sleeves and hem.

Running jacket in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood, zip down the front and zipped chest pocket. Ventilation holes under the arms, ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Reflective details. Unlined. Size of chest pocket 10x17.5 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey in a narrow cut at the top with a print motif, narrow shoulder straps and a racer back.

Short dress in sturdy jersey with a round neck, short, flounced sleeves, a seam at the waist and tie belt that wraps over at the back. Gently flared skirt with concealed pockets in the side seams and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and pleats at the front. Fake fly with a press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Long top in soft pile with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Hat in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend with a pompom at the top and earflaps with ties. Fleece lining.
Studio Collection. Lined, patterned bikini top with a round neck, narrow shoulder straps and zigzag seams around the edges. The polyamide content of the bikini top is recycled.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in marled cotton jersey with a collar, no buttons and slits in the sides.
Multi-strand necklace in metal with chains in various designs and pendants in the shape of a coin and a cross. Adjustable length approx. 41-50 cm.
Short jacket in jersey containing glittery threads with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, long sleeves with elasticated cuffs and an elasticated hem. Jersey lining.
Sandals in woven fabric with an adjustable, lightly padded hook and loop tab at the front and at the back of the heel. Moulded rubber soles, fluted underneath.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with square toes, block heels and fluted soles. Height of soles 1.7 cm. Heel 9.5 cm.
Gently flared, softly draping calf-length skirt in an airy, striped weave with a high waist and covered buttons down the front. Unlined.
V-neck jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Ankle-length jeggings in soft, stretch denim with worn details. Extra-high waist, a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs.

Ankle-length trousers woven in a soft viscose blend with a high, paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, flap leg pockets with a pleat, and tapered legs.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps, a lace trim at the top and concealed press-studs at the crotch.
Cropped top in crushed velvet with a round neck and short sleeves.
Jumper in an extra-soft, fine-knit cotton blend with a roll-edge neckline, button on one shoulder and narrow ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Fully lined, one-shoulder swimsuit with a decorative tie detail on the shoulder and a cut-out section at the waist.

Set with a top and pair of tights in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections. Long-sleeved sports top with thumbholes at the cuffs. Ankle-length sports tights with a high waist and wide, elasticated ribbed waistband. The set is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Short shorts in sturdy cotton denim with a high, frill-trimmed paper bag waist. Button fly, front and back pockets and a detachable denim belt with metal rings. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Metal ear cuffs in various designs.
Fine-knit polo shirt in a silk and cotton blend with a button placket and ribbing at the collar, cuffs and hem.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton and silk blend. Flatlock seam at the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Vest top in a soft, ribbed viscose blend.
Short-sleeved bodysuits in organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Cropped T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Trousers in a stretch weave with a fly with a hook-and-eye fastener, a regular waist, side pockets and tapered legs.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Shirt in soft cotton twill with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Velour-covered hair elastic.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a small frilled collar and concealed buttons with a frilled button band down the front. Frilled yoke at the back, gathers at the shoulders and long sleeves with narrow, frill-trimmed cuffs. Unlined.
Skirt in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise and an elasticated waist. Lined.

Longer blouse in lightweight, softly draping satin with a sheen. Small, gathered stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening at the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
V-neck dress in woven fabric with dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves. Seam at the waist with a tapered bodice, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.

Short dress in airy, crinkled, patterned chiffon with a rounded collar and button placket. Pin-tucks and frills at the front and long sleeves with frill trims at the shoulders and cuffs. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and a gently flared, lined skirt.

Coat in sturdy twill with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and three buttons at the front. Diagonal side pockets, two inner pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Long-sleeved top with an appliqué on the front, a round neck with a press-stud on one shoulder, and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Hoop earrings in textured metal. Diameter approx. 4 cm.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, pair of leggings, an all-in-one suit, a T-shirt and a hat in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with a wide foldover waistband, elasticated heels and full feet. All-in-one suit with an all-over print, press-studs down the front and at the crotch, elasticated heels and full feet. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and lapped shoulders.
Short cotton twill skirt with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and visible seams front and back.
5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch, supersoft twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly and press-stud.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey with a small embroidery detail on the chest.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Sleeveless top in soft jersey made from a modal and organic cotton blend with a small flounce at the front that continues over the shoulders.

5-pocket skinny fit jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly with a press-stud, decorative stitching o the legs and decorative seams on the back pockets.
Long block-coloured shirt in checked cotton flannel with press-studs down the front and at the cuffs. Chest pocket and yoke at the back with decorative metal rings, and a rounded hem.
Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Scarf in a patterned weave that can also be tied as a hairband. Size 50x50 cm.
Sturdy hat in felted wool with a band. Width of brim 6.5 cm.
Slip-on trainers in cotton canvas with elastic gores in the sides and a grosgrain loop at the back. Imitation leather insoles and textured rubber soles.
Fitted top in a soft, textured knit with long sleeves, a ribbed V-neck and pearly buttons down the front.
Short dress in a cotton weave with a deep, flounce-trimmed V-neck and wrapover front and back. Narrow ties that fasten at one side. Lined skirt.
